section.title: Code Tags
section.para: Using the code tag with some fancy css, create a wiki style code block. Use a single br tag to go to a new line.
Here is the implementation of that block in the xml file:
section.code:
code.code {
border: 1px dashed #999;
padding: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
margin-left: 20px;
background-color: rgb(255, 255, 215);
Font-family: Monospace;
}
